dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper represents a novel compression method for ultrasound images in a tele ultrasound system The encoder chooses the ultrasound scan line signals as the object to be compressed and transmitted other than the standard video images in conventional methods Furthermore nonuniform discrete wavelet transform is proposed considering the different resolutions in axial and lateral directions of ultrasound images Experimental results show that the new method provides better compression performance than conventional methods in terms of a peak signal to noise ratio and processing time
IEEE transactions on information technology in biomedicine : a publication of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society
Design and implementation of a novel compression method in a tele-ultrasound system.
